TEXT.English: The Imperialism civic is unlocked by default. The core of the Empire cannot collapse and cities in your core territories won't revolt against your rule, while you hold your historic capital.
TEXT.French: Le coeur de l'Empire ne peut pas s'effondrer à cause de l'instabilité
TEXT.German: Der Kern des Reiches kann nicht wegen Instabilität kollabieren
TEXT.Italian: Il fulcro dell'Impero non può collassare per instabilità
TEXT.Spanish: The Imperialism civic is unlocked by default. The core of the Empire cannot collapse and cities in your core territories won't revolt against your rule, if you manage to hold on to your historic capital.
TEXT.Portuguese: O centro do Império não pode colapsar por instabilidade

TEXT.French: Pas de résistance dans les villes conquites
TEXT.German: Keine Anarchy durch Widerstand in eroberten Städten

TEXT.English: Reduced penalty for expanding into foreign land.
TEXT.German: Reduzierter Expansionsmalus für Städte in fremden Ländern
TEXT.Italian: Penalità ridotta per l'espansione nelle terre straniere
TEXT.Spanish: Reduced penalty for expanding into foreign land.
TEXT.Portuguese: Penalidade reduzida por expandir-se para terras estrangeiras

TEXT.English: If your State Religion is a major religion, it spreads to each newly acquired city and a free Temple is built there.
TEXT.French: La religion d'Etat se répand dans chaque ville avec un temple
TEXT.German: Verbreitung der Staatsreligion und Errichtung eines Tempels in jeder gegründeten, eroberten oder übergelaufenen Stadt
TEXT.Italian: La Religione Ufficiale si diffonde in ogni città aquisita, ed un tempio viene costruito automaticamente
TEXT.Spanish: If your State Religion is a major religion, it spreads to each newly acquired city and a free Temple is built there.
TEXT.Portuguese: A Religião Estatal espalha-se para toda cidade adquirida (fundada, conquistada, reclamada) e um Templo é feito imediatamente

TEXT.English: All units start with the Medic I promotion, excess health in your cities contribute to their growth (with a 2:1 health to food ratio).
TEXT.French: Chaque unité commence avec la promotion Infirmier I
TEXT.German: Alle Einheiten starten mit der Beförderung Sanitäter I
TEXT.Italian: Tutte le unità iniziano con la promozione Medico I
TEXT.Spanish: All units start with the Medic I promotion, excess health in your cities contribute to their growth (with a 2:1 health to food ratio).
TEXT.Portuguese: Todas as unidades começam com a promoção Médico I

TEXT.English: Less stability penalty from Religious Persecution and +2 [ICON_ESPIONAGE] per city.
TEXT.French: Pas de pénalités pour les Persécuteur et +2XP par ville
TEXT.German: Kein Stabilitätsmalus durch Inquisition und +2[ICON_ESPIONAGE] pro Stadt
TEXT.Italian: Nessuna penalità in punti stabilità per le Persecuzioni Religiose e +2XP in ogni città
TEXT.Spanish: Less stability penalty from Religious Persecution and +2 [ICON_ESPIONAGE] per city.
TEXT.Portuguese: Sem penalidade na estabilidade por Perseguições Religiosas e +2 Pontos de Espionagem por cidade

TEXT.English: All naval units can enter ocean tiles, trade is possible through oceans by default, less stability penalty for razing cities.
TEXT.French: Toutes les unités navales peuvent entrer dans l'océan
TEXT.German: Alle Marineeinheiten können den Ozean befahren
TEXT.Italian: Tutte le unità navali possono passare sulle caselle oceaniche
TEXT.Spanish: All naval units can enter ocean tiles, trade is possible through oceans by default, less stability penalty for razing cities.
TEXT.Portuguese: Todas as unidades navais podem entrar nas casas de oceano

TEXT.English: The Merchant Republic civic is unlocked by default, Merchant Republic's too many cities stability penalty is decreased.
TEXT.Spanish: Starts with Merchant Republic, less stability penalty for having too many cities in a Merchant Republic.

TEXT.English: +2[ICON_CULTURE] and +1[ICON_HAPPY] in your cities, if you do not have a state religion.
TEXT.French: +2[ICON_CULTURE] and +1[ICON_HAPPY] in cities without state religion
TEXT.German: +2[ICON_CULTURE] und +1[ICON_HAPPY] in jeder Stadt ohne Staatsreligion
TEXT.Italian: +2[ICON_CULTURE] e +1[ICON_HAPPY] per ogni città senza Religione Ufficiale
TEXT.Spanish: +2[ICON_CULTURE] and +1[ICON_HAPPY] in cities without state religion
TEXT.Portuguese: +2[ICON_CULTURE] e +1[ICON_HAPPY] em cidades sem religião estatal

TEXT.English: No unhappiness or instability from foreign culture, and +1[ICON_HAPPY] in all cities.
TEXT.French: Pas de mécontentement ou d'instabilité pour une cuture étrangère. +1[ICON_HAPPY] dans les villes
TEXT.German: Keine Unzufriedenheit oder Instabilität durch fremde Kultur und +1[ICON_HAPPY] in allen Städten
TEXT.Italian: Nessuna infelicità o instabilità dalla cultura straniera, e +1[ICON_HAPPY] in ogni città
TEXT.Spanish: No unhappiness or instability from foreign culture, and +1[ICON_HAPPY] in all cities
TEXT.Portuguese: Sem infelicidade ou instabilidade por cultura estrangeira, e +1[ICON_HAPPY] em todas as cidades

TEXT.English: 25% faster unit production after the discovery of Gunpowder.
TEXT.French: Production d'unités 25%% plus rapide après la découverte de la Poudre à Canon
TEXT.German: Steigert die Produktion von Einheiten um 25% nach der Erfindung des Schießpulvers
TEXT.Italian: L'addestramento di unità è il 25% più veloce dopo la scoperta della Polvere da Sparo
TEXT.Spanish: 25% faster unit production after the discovery of Gunpowder.
TEXT.Portuguese: Produção militar incrementada em 25% depois da descoberta da Pólvora

TEXT.English: No unhappiness or instability from non-state religions. Religions spread more easily to your cities.
TEXT.French: No unhappiness or instability from non-state religions
TEXT.German: Keine Unzufriedenheit oder Instabilität durch nicht-Staatsreligionen
TEXT.Italian: Nessuna infelicità o instabilità dalle religioni non-ufficiali
TEXT.Spanish: No unhappiness or instability from non-state religions
TEXT.Portuguese: Sem infelicidade ou instabilidade por religião estrangeira

TEXT.English: The Power of the Endless Land:
TEXT.Spanish: The Power of the Endless Land:

TEXT.English: 50% decrease in all city maintenance costs from both number of cities and city distance, and also in all civic costs associated with cities.
TEXT.French: -50% de coût de maintenance pour le nombre de villes
TEXT.German: 50% reduzierte Unterhaltskosten für die Anzahl an Städten
TEXT.Italian: -50% costo di mantenimento per il numero delle città
TEXT.Spanish: 50% decrease in all city maintenance costs from both number of cities and city distance, and also in all civic costs associated with cities.
TEXT.Portuguese: Redução de 50% em todo custo de manutenção associado com o número de cidades

TEXT.English: All mercenary costs are halved, companies are more likely to spread to your cities.
TEXT.Spanish: All mercenary costs are halved, companies are more likely to spread to your cities.
TEXT.Portuguese: Os custos de Mercenários são cortados pela metade
O Poder da Economia das Cabanas

TEXT.English: Cottages, Hamlets, Villages and Towns produce +1[ICON_PRODUCTION], Workshops produce +1[ICON_COMMERCE].
Colonial Projects are 30% cheaper to build, free Feitoria in your newly founded cities after the discovery of Astronomy.
TEXT.French: Les projets coloniaux coûte 30%% moins cher à produire
TEXT.Italian: I Progetti Coloniali vengono costruiti il 30% più velocemente
TEXT.Spanish: Colonial Projects are 30% cheaper to build, free Feitoria in your newly founded cities after the discovery of Astronomy.

TEXT.French: Les nations lointaines sont plus amicale
TEXT.German: Andere Zivilisationen sind im allgmeinen wohlgesinnter
TEXT.Italian: Le nazioni straniere sono generalmente amichevoli
TEXT.Portuguese: Nações estrangeiras são geralmente mais amigáveis

TEXT.English: Less stability penalty from non-state religions. Janissary Units are recruited for your service for free, their generation rate is based on the infidel populace in your cities. Newly conquered cities highly contribute to the generation of the next Janissary.
TEXT.French: Every turn you generate Janissary points for foreign religion in your cities, this gives you free units every few turns
TEXT.German: Fremde Religionen erzeugen in jeder Runde Janitscharen-Punkte in euren Städten, dadurch erhaltet ihr alle paar Runden freie Einheiten
TEXT.Italian: Ogni turno generi punti Giannizzeri per le religioni straniere nelle tue città, che ti forniscono dei Giannizzeri ogni tanto
TEXT.Spanish: Every turn you generate Janissary points for foreign religion in your cities, this gives you free units every few turns
TEXT.Portuguese: Todo turno você gera pontos de Janízaro por religião estrangeira nas suas cidades, isso lhe dá unidades de graça periodicamente

TEXT.French: Le Pouvoir de la Formation Militaire:

TEXT.English: All units start with the Formation promotion.
TEXT.French: Toute les unités commence avec la promotion Formation
TEXT.German: Alle Einheiten starten mit der Beförderung Formation
TEXT.Italian: Tutte le unità cominciano con la promozione Formazione
TEXT.Spanish: All units start with the Formation promotion.
TEXT.Portuguese: Todas as unidades começam com a promoção Formação

TEXT.English: +2 gold per turn for every foreign city on the coast of the Baltic Sea.
TEXT.French: You get 2 gold per turn for every foreign coastal city in the Baltic.
TEXT.German: You get 2 gold per turn for every foreign coastal city in the Baltic.
TEXT.Italian: You get 2 gold per turn for every foreign coastal city in the Baltic.
TEXT.Spanish: You get 2 gold per turn for every foreign coastal city in the Baltic.
TEXT.Portuguese: You get 2 gold per turn for every foreign coastal city in the Baltic.

TEXT.English: The Theocracy civic is unlocked by default, no stability penalties from anarchy.
TEXT.French: Starts with Theocracy and no stability penalties from anarchy.
TEXT.German: Starts with Theocracy and no stability penalties from anarchy.
TEXT.Italian: Starts with Theocracy and no stability penalties from anarchy.
TEXT.Spanish: Starts with Theocracy and no stability penalties from anarchy.
TEXT.Portuguese: Starts with Theocracy and no stability penalties from anarchy.

TEXT.English: The Power of the Lord City:
TEXT.French: The Power of the Lord City:
TEXT.German: The Power of the Lord City:
TEXT.Portuguese: The Power of the Lord City:

TEXT.English: The Bureaucracy civic is unlocked by default, Bureaucracy's too many cities stability penalty is decreased.
TEXT.French: Starts with Bureaucracy, less stability penalty for having too many cities in a bureaucratic government.
TEXT.German: Starts with Bureaucracy, less stability penalty for having too many cities in a bureaucratic government.
TEXT.Italian: All'avvio sono abilitati governo ereditario e schiavitï¿½
TEXT.Spanish: Gobierno hereditario y Esclavitud están activados al principio
TEXT.Portuguese: Starts with Bureaucracy, less stability penalty for having too many cities in a bureaucratic government.

TEXT.English: When one of your cities with a significant Scottish population is conquered, all your other Scottish cities get free defenders. Lower stability hit from losing a city. Forts add +2[ICON_COMMERCE].
TEXT.French: When one of your cities with a significant Scottish population is conquered, all your other Scottish cities get free defenders. Lower stability hit from losing a city. Forts add +2[ICON_COMMERCE].
TEXT.German: When one of your cities with a significant Scottish population is conquered, all your other Scottish cities get free defenders. Lower stability hit from losing a city. Forts add +2[ICON_COMMERCE].
TEXT.Italian: When one of your cities with a significant Scottish population is conquered, all your other Scottish cities get free defenders. Lower stability hit from losing a city. Forts add +2[ICON_COMMERCE].
TEXT.Spanish: When one of your cities with a significant Scottish population is conquered, all your other Scottish cities get free defenders. Lower stability hit from losing a city. Forts add +2[ICON_COMMERCE].
TEXT.Portuguese: When one of your cities with a significant Scottish population is conquered, all your other Scottish cities get free defenders. Lower stability hit from losing a city. Forts add +2[ICON_COMMERCE].

TEXT.English: Extra commerce in your capital for every province you have a city in.
TEXT.French: Extra commerce in your capital for every province you have a city in.
TEXT.German: Extra commerce in your capital for every province you have a city in.
TEXT.Italian: Extra commerce in your capital for every province you have a city in.
TEXT.Spanish: Extra commerce in your capital for every province you have a city in.
TEXT.Portuguese: Extra commerce in your capital for every province you have a city in.

TEXT.English: Deserts and particularly oases have improved yield.
TEXT.French: Deserts and particularly oases have improved yield.
TEXT.German: Deserts and particularly oases have improved yield.
TEXT.Italian: Deserts and particularly oases have improved yield.
TEXT.Spanish: Deserts and particularly oases have improved yield.
TEXT.Portuguese: Deserts and particularly oases have improved yield.

TEXT.English: fear the same fate of their neighbour inhabitants and surrender!
TEXT.French: craignent de subir le mï¿½me sort que leurs voisins et se rendent!
TEXT.German: befürchten dass sie dasselbe Schicksal ereilt wie ihre Nachbarn und kapitulieren!
TEXT.Italian: temono di subire lo stesso fato dei vicini e si arrendono!
TEXT.Spanish: temen sufrir el mismo destino que sus vecinos y se rinden.
TEXT.Portuguese: temem o mesmo destino dos habitantes da vizinhança e se rendem!

TEXT.English: You got %d1_Gold gold income from the Sound Toll.
TEXT.French: You got %d1_Gold gold income from the Sound Toll.
TEXT.German: You got %d1_Gold gold income from the Sound Toll.
TEXT.Italian: You got %d1_Gold gold income from the Sound Toll.
TEXT.Spanish: You got %d1_Gold gold income from the Sound Toll.
TEXT.Portuguese: You got %d1_Gold gold income from the Sound Toll.

TEXT.English: A new Janissary unit reports for service in
TEXT.French: A new Janissary unit reports for service in
TEXT.German: A new Janissary unit reports for service in
TEXT.Italian: A new Janissary unit reports for service in
TEXT.Spanish: A new Janissary unit reports for service in
TEXT.Portuguese: A new Janissary unit reports for service in

TEXT.English: Your proud nation comes to your aid, a new military unit forms in
TEXT.French: Your proud nation comes to your aid, a new military unit forms in
TEXT.German: Your proud nation comes to your aid, a new military unit forms in
TEXT.Italian: Your proud nation comes to your aid, a new military unit forms in
TEXT.Spanish: Your proud nation comes to your aid, a new military unit forms in
TEXT.Portuguese: Your proud nation comes to your aid, a new military unit forms in
